评论详情: The blouse is very pretty and fit good. It came in a beautiful pink color but after washing in cold water the color faded to more a light salmon. It’s still pretty but I wish it was still the original pink.
Lightweight summery top. Lovely peasant style, very dressy.
If you have any sort of bosom, please note that there is absolutely no give to get them into the cup part of the blouse. Very thin but stiff material too. Cute design but no credit for execution.

评论概述: Cute- but tough to believe that these are plus sizes
评论详情: I’m a hippie who dresses as one for a 60’s band. Shirts like these in cotton or gauze are hard to find. This was a direct purchase from China. It took a LONG time to get here.  I think some people are expecting thicker fabric, better construction and fit. Well, I harbored no illusions, and it was just right for me. It’s a very see through fabric and will probably need a cami underneath. It wrinkles easily. The lace will probably itch.  However. It looks great and will be very breezy during hot shows.  Fit: this is advertised as a plus size, but I have my doubts. My normal size is XL and it’s a little on the snugside. I’m 5’5” and 165 lbs. I got another color in XXL which I’m sure will fit.  In the end, you cannot beat the price. It was worth the wait.
Sizing is definitely off, much smaller and sleeves are tight across the shoulders. Ended up giving them to a friend’s young daughter who it fits perfectly.
Size up.
Liked the sky blue color but it had a stain so had to return it.
I love the lose fit. These tops are so comfortable! Look great with jeans!

评论概述: Very beautiful top - fit was perfect.
评论详情: This top fit me perfect. I love the lace on the sleeves!

LOVE LOVE LOVE these linen/cotton blouses. Bought two… just went back for two more colours. THAT’s how much I love them. Just fun to wear. Perfect fabrics. Nice fit, though I did order a size up. I am so pleased… and glad I ignored the low ratings ☺️🤩

This boho linen top is adorable! It has pretty lace, quite roomy, and almost covers your butt. There's no feeling that it's too short like some tops can feel. It is a bit sheer but very nice for hot weather.  Washing instructions: Soak it in cold water with 3 teaspoons of salt overnight before washing. Wash on a delicate cold cycle and let it air dry. It needs a bit of extra care, but well worth it!
